channel.title: Multi-omics on Jun-Liszt Li
channel.description: Recent content in Multi-omics on Jun-Liszt Li

item.title: MetaBrain Explorer (Spatial Multi-omics Brain Explorer)
item.description: A online interactive website for browsing multi-omics data of mouse brain, which including Brain cell type specific RNA-seq, scRNAseq, scATACseq, brain spatial transcriptome, brain spatial metabolome. Detailed gene information, protein domain, related publications are included.
